system.description: When your family faces hardship, temptation, or infighting, roll +Mood.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Your family fractures. Take 1 Sleepers and reduce Mood by 1. The GM will tell you how the family's unity suffers.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: Your family weathers the crisis, but choose one: take 1 Sleepers, reduce Mood by 1, or accept a costly compromise to maintain unity.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: Your family stands strong together. You may also choose to increase Mood by 1 if this crisis brought you closer together.
